author: Staff Reporter
text:
A brawl between two groups belonging to SC and Vanniyar community led to tension at Perumapalayam on Sunday.

A group of persons belonging to Vanniyar community from Navapalayam set fire to a hut in Perumapalayam. But the fire was put out immediately. The group threw stones and reportedly damaged motorcycles. As the quarrel created tension in Perumapalayam police personnel rushed to the spot.
title: Squabble leads to communal clash
